location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: blueprintDimensions: 770 x 1330mm, on sheet 830 x 1370mm

mods.abstract: Map showing the fire prevention service at the Bahrain Petroleum Company (BAPCO) Refinery, Bahrain, produced by the Bahrain Petroleum Company.The map shows the Refinery perimeter, pipeways, roadways, and the following features:fire hydrantsnew fire hydrants installed since 20 September 1937hydrants on well discharge40-gallon Foamite extinguishers100 foot lengths of 1.5 inch hoseportable Foamite generator cartsstations at which one or more pieces of equipment were situatedFuture installations are shown in red.
